RelationsClearView.Title: Clear view
RelationsClearView.ShortHelp: Removes all the objects from the current view.
RelationsCmd.Title: Relations
RelationsCmd.ShortHelp: Opens the Relations app and displays the related objects by navigating relationships and paths.
RelationColumnsMgt.Title: Relation Column Options
RelationColumnsMgt.ShortHelp: Customize the behavior of the Relation columns.
RelationsCustomize.Title: Customize
RelationsCustomize.LongHelp: You can customize the relations sets, display attributes, and the display options.
RelationsEditLayout.Title: Edit layout
RelationsEditLayout.LongHelp: Select the node, one at a time, and drop it where you want to move it.
RelationsExpandCollapse.Title: Expand/Collapse
RelationsExpandCollapse.ShortHelp: Expands or collapses the graph or the table view.
RelationsExpandCollapse.LongHelp: Expands or Collapses the graph or the table to display the upstream or the downstream relations.
RelationsExport.Title: Export
RelationsExport.ShortHelp: Exports the structure as a .csv file.
RelationsFavourite.Title: Save as favorite
RelationsFavourite.ShortHelp: Saves the current layout as favorite.
RelationsFavourite.LongHelp:
The current view and the navigation are saved as a favorite that you can open in the current form at a later stage.

Note: The customized attributes, and therefore the columns in the data grid view, are not saved in the favorites. When you open a favorite, the current configuration attributes of the app are considered.
RelationsFindPaths.Title: Find paths
RelationsFindPaths.ShortHelp: Lets you navigate the paths through the different levels until the destination node.
RelationsFindPaths.LongHelp: You can analyze the network and the different links and loops within a structure to see all the impacts before you edit a part. You can compute existing paths inside the loaded view, based on child relation.
RelationsFitAll.Title: Fit all
RelationsFitAll.ShortHelp: Fits the entire graph into the view.
RelationsHome.Title: Home
RelationsInformation.Title: Information
RelationsInformation.ShortHelp: Displays the information panel for the selected object.
RelationsMultiSelection.Title: Multi selection
RelationsMultiSelection.ShortHelp: Selects the objects in the different configurations.
RelationsMultiSelection.LongHelp: Helps you select the multiple objects, all the objects or selection based on the upstream or the downstream relations
RelationsPrint.Title: Print the view
RelationsRefresh.Title: Refresh
RelationsShowHide.Title: Show/Hide
RelationsShowHide.ShortHelp: Shows or hides the selected nodes and their relationships.
RelationsViews.Title: Views
RelationsViews.ShortHelp: Displays the objects and their relations in the graph or the table view.
RelationsViews.LongHelp:
In graph view, you can navigate the relationships in both the directions.

In table view, you can navigate the relationships only from the object to its children. Switching between the graph and the table view is limited to 50 objects.
